abstract: Large portion of major downtown Ottawa street falls into sinkhole; officials report no injuries or deaths.

headline.print_headline: Sinkhole Swallows Major Street in Downtown Ottawa
headline.main: Sinkhole Opens Under Busy Street in Downtown Ottawa

snippet: A shopping mall, offices, hotel and convention center were evacuated and a minivan was swallowed up, but there were no immediate reports of injuries.
lead_paragraph: A shopping mall, offices, hotel and convention center were evacuated and a minivan was swallowed up, but there were no immediate reports of injuries.
